title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
author: Charlie Egan
body: This movie was so good. Some absolutely amazingly filmed scenes and the music was spot on. If you want to have a blast at the theaters this is the movie to see right now, highly recommend it.

annotated_sentences.comment: so good does quite not warrant +2

annotated_sentences.text: Some absolutely amazingly filmed scenes and the music was spot on. If you want to have a blast at the theaters this is the movie to see right now, highly recommend it.

movie.justification: highly recommend, the movie to see right now, have a blast

annotated_sentences.comment: added new aspect cinematography, filmed scene didn't fit elsewhere
